item.title: [508]command problem[508]
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

It should be 1 error there causing the problem… p.frames.sendMessage should be p.sendMessage

                } else if (cmd[0].equals("ags")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add an armadyl godsword in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11694, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("bgs")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add an Bandos godsword in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11696, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("sgs")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add an Saradomin godsword in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11698, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("zgs")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add an Zamorak godsword in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11700, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("allgod")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add all godswords in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11694, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11696, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11698, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11700, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("armadyl")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add full armadyl in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11718, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11720, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11722, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("armadyl")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add full bandos in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11724, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11726, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11728, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("void")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add full void in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8839, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8840, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8842, 1);
                } else if (cmd[0].equals("voidhoods")) {
                //p.rights = 2;
                p.sendMessage(p, "you have add all void hoods in you bag!);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11663, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11664, 1);
		Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11665, 1);

Read full topic

item.title: [508]command problem[508]
item.dc:creator: @jeans-scape jeans-scape
item.description:
@jeans-scape wrote:

Hello moparscapers

i have made some commands for my 508 server but it doesnt work 100%

               this are the commands

[code] } else if (cmd[0].equals(“ags”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add an armadyl godsword in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11694, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“bgs”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add an Bandos godsword in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11696, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“sgs”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add an Saradomin godsword in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11698, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“zgs”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add an Zamorak godsword in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11700, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“allgod”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add all godswords in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11694, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11696, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11698, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11700, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“armadyl”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add full armadyl in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11718, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11720, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11722, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“armadyl”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add full bandos in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11724, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11726, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11728, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“void”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add full void in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8839, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8840, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 8842, 1);
} else if (cmd[0].equals(“voidhoods”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "you have add all void hoods in you bag!);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11663, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11664, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 11665, 1);

[/code]

maybe someone know the problem?

Regards Meene

contact :
hotmail/msn Meene_Eekkerk@hotmail.com
